scripts.postinstall: yarn-deduplicate && yarn workspace @expo/cli prepare && patch-package && node ./tools/bin/expotools.js validate-workspace-dependencies
scripts.install:react-native-lab: (([ "$(ls -A react-native-lab/react-native)" ] && (yarn --cwd react-native-lab/react-native install --frozen-lockfile || true)) || echo "Skipping installing Node modules in react-native-lab/react-native (directory empty)")
scripts.tsc: echo 'You are trying to run "tsc" in the workspace root. Run it from an individual package instead.' && exit 1
